snippet: Former President Hosni Mubarak was questioned about $1 million worth of gifts that Al Ahram, which operates several media outlets, gave him as demonstrations of loyalty, its Web site reported.
lead_paragraph: Former President Hosni Mubarak was questioned about $1 million worth of gifts that Al Ahram, which operates several media outlets, gave him as demonstrations of loyalty, its Web site reported.

headline.main: Mubarak Is Asked About Media Gifts
headline.print_headline: Mubarak Is Asked About Media Gifts
